extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    A GPA of 2.6 in a minium of 24.0 units in ARTH and Level 4 and registration in an ARTH Major or Medial Plan.

basic.description: An in-depth study of Renaissance painting techniques in Italy and/or Northern Europe. Selected issues of technique and conservation will be examined within a broader art-historical framework.
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: Studies in Renaissance Painting Technique
